item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You can't just turn on creativity like a faucet. You have to be in the right mood. What mood is that? Last-minute panic." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "CALVIN: This whole Santa Claus thing just doesn't make sense. Why all the secrecy? Why all the mystery? If the guy exists why doesn't he ever show himself and prove it? And if he doesn't exist what's the meaning of all this? HOBBES: I dunno. Isn't this a religious holiday? CALVIN: Yeah, but actually, I've got the same questions about God." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "There's never enough time to do all the nothing you want." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by BILL WATTERSON
item.description: "It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept." -- BILL WATTERSON

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "That's one of the remarkable things about life. It's never so bad that it can't get worse." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "People think it must be fun to be a super genius, but they don't realize how hard it is to put up with all the idiots in the world." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "If you can't win by reason, go for volume." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Calvin : There's no problem so awful, that you can't add some guilt to it and make it even worse." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Happiness is being famous for your financial ability to indulge in every kind of excess." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Calvin: Life's a lot more fun when you aren't responsible for your actions." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Charles J. Sykes
item.description: "Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them. We all could." -- Charles J. Sykes

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Deepthi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein
